question: Which state planed to develop Skill City to have 10,000 training seats may take 4-5 years to get functional?
explanation: The Assam State government to launch well-equipped cities with the capacity of 10000 seats in the state. A Singapore based premier institute will support the state government for further development. Around 30 thousand former militants will be given skill development training and cease-fire camps where they are residing now will be made production centers.
